languages.text: "Не могу исполнить, леди Зауэрбэк!" {n}Аврилла бледна, но в глазах пылает пламя.{/n} "Это — моя палуба, мой отсек, и, пока ситуация в отсеке находится под особым контролем Лорд-капитана, без моей визы тут не могут проводиться никакие операции! Отменить это могут только трое — Первый офицер, Вольный Торговец и сам Император!"

"I cannot comply with that order, ma'am!" {n}Vent looks shaken, but there is fire in her eyes.{/n} "This is my deck and my sector. So long as this area remains under the Lord Captain's special oversight, no action can be taken without my express permission. There are only three people who are authorised to make me stand down — the first officer, the Rogue Trader, and the Emperor Himself!"
languages.original_text: "Не могу исполнить, леди Зауэрбэк!" {n}Аврилла бледна, но в глазах пылает пламя.{/n} "Это — моя палуба, мой отсек, и, пока ситуация в отсеке находится под особым контролем Лорд-капитана, без моей визы тут не могут проводиться никакие операции! Отменить это могут только трое — Первый офицер, Вольный Торговец и сам Император!"

So long as this area remains under the Lord Captain's special oversight, no action can be taken without my express permission. There are only three people who are authorised to make me stand down — the first officer, the Rogue Trader, and the Emperor Himself!"

"I cannot comply with that order, ma'am!" {n}Vent looks shaken, but there is fire in her eyes.{/n} "This is my deck and my sector. So long as this area remains under the Lord Captain's special oversight, no action can be taken without my express permission. There are only three people who are authorised to make me stand down — the first officer, the Rogue Trader, and the Emperor Himself!"

"You can take your orders and shove them! This is my deck and my sector. There are only three people who can waltz in here without my express permission — the first officer, the Rogue Trader, and the Emperor himself!"

There are only three people who are authorised to make me stand down — the first officer, the Rogue Trader, and the Emperor Himself!"

languages.text: “请恕我无法执行命令，长官！”{n}温特看起来有些动摇，但她的目光中依然闪着火光。{/n}“甲板的这片区域由我负责。只要这片区域依然在舰长大人的特别监管之下，没有我明确许可的情况下，任何人都无权贸然采取行动。只有三个人有权撤掉我的职位——要么是总领，要么是舰长大人，要么是帝皇本人！”
languages.original_text: "I cannot comply with that order, ma'am!" {n}Vent looks shaken, but there is fire in her eyes.{/n} "This is my deck and my sector. So long as this area remains under the Lord Captain's special oversight, no action can be taken without my express permission. There are only three people who are authorised to make me stand down — the first officer, the Rogue Trader, and the Emperor Himself!"

traits.locale_text: “请恕我无法执行命令，长官！”{n}温特看起来有些动摇，但她的目光中依然闪着火光。{/n}“甲板的这片区域由我负责。只要这片区域依然在舰长大人的特别监管之下，没有我明确许可的情况下，任何人都无权贸然采取行动。只有三个人有权撤掉我的职位——要么是总领，要么是舰长大人，要么是帝皇本人！”

languages.text: «¡No puedo cumplir esa orden, señora!». {n}Vent está cohibida, pero su expresión es firme.{/n} «Soy la responsable de esta cubierta y este sector. Mientras esta zona permanezca bajo la supervisión especial {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán, no se puede intervenir sin mi consentimiento expreso. ¡Y solo hay tres personas con autoridad para apartarme de mi deber: el primer oficial, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente y el mismísimo Emperador!».
languages.original_text: "I cannot comply with that order, ma'am!" {n}Vent looks shaken, but there is fire in her eyes.{/n} "This is my deck and my sector. So long as this area remains under the Lord Captain's special oversight, no action can be taken without my express permission. There are only three people who are authorised to make me stand down — the first officer, the Rogue Trader, and the Emperor Himself!"

traits.locale_text: «¡No puedo cumplir esa orden, señora!». {n}Vent está cohibida, pero su expresión es firme.{/n} «Soy la responsable de esta cubierta y este sector. Mientras esta zona permanezca bajo la supervisión especial {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán, no se puede intervenir sin mi consentimiento expreso. ¡Y solo hay tres personas con autoridad para apartarme de mi deber: el primer oficial, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente y el mismísimo Emperador!».

languages.text: 「その命令には従えません！」{n}ヴェントは震えているようだったが、その目には炎が宿っている。{/n}「ここは私の甲板であり、私のセクターです。この地域がロード・キャプテンの特別監督下にある限り、私の明確な許可なしに行動を起こすことはできません。許可なく入ってこられるのは、3人だけ。私の上官と、自由開拓者、そして皇帝陛下ご自身のみだ！」
languages.original_text: "I cannot comply with that order, ma'am!" {n}Vent looks shaken, but there is fire in her eyes.{/n} "This is my deck and my sector. So long as this area remains under the Lord Captain's special oversight, no action can be taken without my express permission. There are only three people who are authorised to make me stand down — the first officer, the Rogue Trader, and the Emperor Himself!"

traits.locale_text: 「その命令には従えません！」{n}ヴェントは震えているようだったが、その目には炎が宿っている。{/n}「ここは私の甲板であり、私のセクターです。この地域がロード・キャプテンの特別監督下にある限り、私の明確な許可なしに行動を起こすことはできません。許可なく入ってこられるのは、3人だけ。私の上官と、自由開拓者、そして皇帝陛下ご自身のみだ！」

languages.text: "Diesen Befehl kann ich nicht ausführen, Ma'am!" {n}Vent wirkt aufgewühlt, aber in ihren Augen lodert ein Feuer.{/n}"Das ist mein Deck und mein Sektor. Solange dieser Abschnitt unter der Aufsicht des Lord Captains steht, wird ohne meine ausdrückliche Erlaubnis nichts unternommen. Es gibt nur drei Personen, die autorisiert sind, mich aufzuhalten ... der erste Offizier, {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} und der Imperator selbst!"
languages.original_text: "I cannot comply with that order, ma'am!" {n}Vent looks shaken, but there is fire in her eyes.{/n} "This is my deck and my sector. So long as this area remains under the Lord Captain's special oversight, no action can be taken without my express permission. There are only three people who are authorised to make me stand down — the first officer, the Rogue Trader, and the Emperor Himself!"

traits.locale_text: "Diesen Befehl kann ich nicht ausführen, Ma'am!" {n}Vent wirkt aufgewühlt, aber in ihren Augen lodert ein Feuer.{/n}"Das ist mein Deck und mein Sektor. Solange dieser Abschnitt unter der Aufsicht des Lord Captains steht, wird ohne meine ausdrückliche Erlaubnis nichts unternommen. Es gibt nur drei Personen, die autorisiert sind, mich aufzuhalten ... der erste Offizier, {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} und der Imperator selbst!"

languages.text: « C'est un ordre auquel je ne peux consentir, madame ! {n}Malgré sa détresse évidente, une flamme brûlante illumine son regard.{/n} Ce pont et ce secteur sont placés sous mon commandement. Tant que cette zone reste sous la supervision spéciale {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, tout ce qui s'y passe est soumis à mon autorisation expresse. Seules trois personnes peuvent outrepasser mon autorité : l'officier en second, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} et l'Empereur lui-même ! »
languages.original_text: "I cannot comply with that order, ma'am!" {n}Vent looks shaken, but there is fire in her eyes.{/n} "This is my deck and my sector. So long as this area remains under the Lord Captain's special oversight, no action can be taken without my express permission. There are only three people who are authorised to make me stand down — the first officer, the Rogue Trader, and the Emperor Himself!"

traits.locale_text: « C'est un ordre auquel je ne peux consentir, madame ! {n}Malgré sa détresse évidente, une flamme brûlante illumine son regard.{/n} Ce pont et ce secteur sont placés sous mon commandement. Tant que cette zone reste sous la supervision spéciale {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, tout ce qui s'y passe est soumis à mon autorisation expresse. Seules trois personnes peuvent outrepasser mon autorité : l'officier en second, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} et l'Empereur lui-même ! »

languages.text: "Emrinizi yerine getiremem komutanım!" {n}Vent, sarsılmış görünse de gözlerinden alev saçıyor.{/n} "Burası benim güvertem, benim sektörüm. Bu alan, Lord Kaptan'ın özel nezareti altında olduğu müddetçe, açık iznim olmadan hiçbir eylemde bulunulamaz. Beni buradan çekmeye yalnızca üç şahsiyet yetkilidir: İkinci kaptan, Hür Tacir ve yüce İmparator Hazretleri!"
languages.original_text: "I cannot comply with that order, ma'am!" {n}Vent looks shaken, but there is fire in her eyes.{/n} "This is my deck and my sector. So long as this area remains under the Lord Captain's special oversight, no action can be taken without my express permission. There are only three people who are authorised to make me stand down — the first officer, the Rogue Trader, and the Emperor Himself!"

Bu alan, Lord Kaptan'ın özel nezareti altında olduğu müddetçe, açık iznim olmadan hiçbir eylemde bulunulamaz. Beni buradan çekmeye yalnızca üç şahsiyet yetkilidir: İkinci kaptan, Hür Tacir ve yüce İmparator Hazretleri!"
